education.institution: Duy Tan University, Da Nang, Viet Nam
details: Studying a globally accredited program in collaboration with Carnegie Mellon University.
Learning how to provide end-to-end customer support, ranging from identifying problems to troubleshooting.
Specializing in Linux, Domain Name Systems, Command-Line Interface, and Binary Code.
Foundations of Agile project management with a focus on Scrum events, artifacts, and roles.
Practice strategic communication, problem-solving, and stakeholder management.
Manage IT resources at scale, both for physical machines and virtual machines in the cloud.
Analyze real-world IT problems and implement appropriate strategies to solve them.
